English:
Wargh! Wh-wh-wh-wh-what ARE you!? I mean, going
up to people you don't know? And TALKING to them!?
Your charisma stat must be astronomical...
Chinese:
哇！　你你你你是怎樣！？
居、居然突然跟陌生人搭話，
你、你的溝通能力到底是有多強啊！
Korean:
우왓! 뭐뭐뭐뭔가요, 당신.
모, 모르는 사람에게 갑자기 말을 걸다니
어, 얼마나 커뮤니케이션 능력이 높은 겁니까?
German:
Huargh! W-W-Was bist du denn?! Einfach auf fremde
Leute zuzugehen und mit ihnen zu REDEN?!
Dein Charismawert muss ewig hoch sein ...

English:
Th-th-th-th-this humble one is just a Mimi-tan
fan... I heard on the Mimi-tan forums that
there's a private Mimi-tan event here in Akiba!
Chinese:
我我我、我只是一個普通的「小蜜蜜」的粉絲……
秋葉原最近有個消息，說小蜜蜜的粉絲將會在
小蜜蜜廣場舉辦非官方的活動……
Korean:
저저저, 전 그냥「미미땅」팬입니다…
곧 아키하바라에서 미미땅 팬의 비공식 이벤트가
미미땅 포럼에서 개최되는 겁니다…
German:
I-I-Ich bin nur ein bescheidener Fan von
Mimi-Tan ... Ich habe in einem Forum gelesen, dass
hier in Akiba ein privates Event stattfindet!

English:
Disappearances?
Wh-what? Mimi-tan's been spirited away!?
Mimi-tan has passed away, into the land of Akiba!?
Chinese:
神秘失蹤事件……？
咦？小蜜蜜下落不明！？
小蜜蜜神在秋葉原這裡躲起來了……咦咦！？
Korean:
행방불명…?
엣, 미미땅의 행방불명!?
미미땅 신이 아키하바라 땅에 잠들었다…에엣!?
German:
Verschwundene Leute?
W-Wie? Jemand hat Mimi-Tan entführt?!
Mimi-Tan ist ins Land Akiba entschwunden?!

English:
What's with that situation straight out of my
animus? Man, not only is your charisma maxed out,
but your fantasies are top-class, too! Eek, scary!
Chinese:
這個超萌的狀況是怎麼回事！？
你不光是溝通能力，
就連妄想力也如此出色嗎！？　噫！！　好可怕！
Korean:
뭡니까? 그 뜨거운 시츄에이션은!?
당신 커뮤니케이션 능력 뿐 아니라
망상력까지 뛰어난겁니까!? 히익!! 무서워!
German:
D-Das ist ja wie in meinen schlimmsten
Animus-Albträumen! Du hast nicht nur Charisma,
sondern auch eine rege Fantasie! Erschreckend!

English:
In the face of someone with such high stats,
how am I even supposed to respond!?
Chinese:
對於能力值如此之高的你，
我已經沒什麼好說的了！！
Korean:
이렇게나 스테이터스가 높은 당신에게
제가 할 수 있는 말은 이제 아무것도 없습니다…!!
German:
Wie soll ich denn auf jemanden reagieren, der so
imba Stats hat?!

English:
Hah! Hah! Hah!
That is all this unworthy one can say!
Chinese:
……哈啊、哈啊、哈啊！
在下知道的就只有這樣是也！
Korean:
…하아, 하아, 하아!
졸자가 할 말은 이것 뿐이라오…!
German:
Ha! Ha! Ha!
Mehr fällt mir Unwürdigem nicht ein!

English:
Huh? What's the dealio?
Geez, people with the "communication" skill...
Chinese:
啊？　你是怎樣？
就是因為這樣，我才討厭溝通能力很強的人……
Korean:
하? 뭡니까?
이러니 커뮤니케이션 능력이 높은 인간이란…
German:
Hm? Was ist denn los?
Willst du etwa dein Verhandeln hochleveln?

English:
Geez, don't just talk to me like that!
I thought I was gonna drop a brick!
Blurgh, people with "communication skills"...
Chinese:
請、請不要突然跟我搭話！
會害我嚇一跳耶！
就是因為這樣，我才討厭溝通能力很強的人……
Korean:
가, 갑자기 말 걸지 마세요!
놀라잖아요…!
이러니 커뮤니케이션 능력이 높은 사람은…
German:
Quatsch mich doch nicht einfach so an! Ich
erschrecke mich ja zu Tode! Bäh, immer diese Leute
mit Spezialisierung „Umgangsformen“ ...

English:
If I could communicate with Mimi-tan,
my life would be complete...
Chinese:
只要能跟小蜜蜜進行溝通，
我就滿足了……
German:
Wenn ich mit Mimi-Tan kommunizieren könnte, hätte
ich alles im Leben erreicht ...

English: I won't allow you to take her awayyy!!!
Chinese: 這就是神秘失蹤事件的真相吧，太萌啦————！！
German: Ich lasse nicht zu, dass du sie mir wegnimmst!!!

English:
Wargh! Wh-wh-wh-wh-what ARE you!? I mean, going
up to people you don't know? And TALKING to them!?
Your charisma stat must be astronomical...
Chinese:
哇！　你你你你是怎樣！？
居、居然突然跟陌生人搭話，
你、你的溝通能力到底是有多強啊！
Korean:
우왓! 뭐뭐뭐뭔가요, 당신.
모, 모르는 사람에게 갑자기 말을 걸다니
어, 얼마나 커뮤니케이션 능력이 높은 겁니까?
German:
Huargh! W-W-Was bist du denn?! Einfach auf fremde
Leute zuzugehen und mit ihnen zu REDEN?!
Dein Charismawert muss ewig hoch sein ...

English:
Huh? You...you want to talk to ME?
Why? What is it?
Chinese:
咦？　你、你有事情想問我？
你、你到底是想問我什麼事情？
Korean:
예? 저, 저에게 묻고 싶은 것이 있다고요?
뭐, 뭡니까? 대체?
German:
Hö? Du ... willst mit MIR reden?
Warum denn? Was gibt es?

English:
Ahh, [k2500], is it?
For a time there was this huge ad campaign about
how it used the latest in 3D tech and whatnot...
Chinese:
喔，『[k2500]』嗎……
我記得之前有好一陣子，那個的製作公司也有在這一帶
大肆宣傳說他們「採用了最新的3D技術」之類的……
Korean:
아아,『[k2500]』입니까.
뭔가 최신 3D기술을 사용했다고 해서
한때 이 인근에서 대대적으로 선전했습니다만…
German:
Ah, wegen dem [k2500]?
Eine Zeit lang lief eine Werbekampagne, von wegen
das Neuste der 3-D-Technologie und so.

English:
There was a [k2500]
in the arcade down the way, wasn't there?
Chinese:
我記得[k2500]
在那邊的「電子遊樂場」裡好像有一台吧。
German:
In der Arcade da hinten gab es einen
[k2500], oder?

English:
Hrm hum hrum!
There something you wanted to ask?
Chinese:
唔唔唔！
你不是有事情想要問我嗎？
Korean:
무무무!
저한테 묻고 싶었던게 있었던 것 아니었습니까?

English:
[k2500] is kind of a stretch
for an incredibly eligible bachelor like me...
Maybe next time, me and the waifu'll take a few?
Chinese:
像我這種獨行俠根本不會去碰[k2500]那種東西啦。
啊，不過下次要不要跟“老婆”一起去拍拍看呢……
Korean:
[k2500]같은건 친구 없는 저한테는 먼 세상이죠.
아, 그렇지만 이번에 "신부"와 함께 찍어볼까…
German:
Einen [k2500] braucht ein
attraktiver Junggeselle wie ich wohl kaum ...
Das nächste Mal vielleicht schon mit Waifu?
